pages.text: $(bgreen)Strange Cat$() always make others gain more strange xp, such as its relation with cat tail.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)325$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Very Slow$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)close-attack$() plant that can deal $(bred)high damage$() to enemy, and $(l)turn it to another Strange Cat$() if its enemy died. Each attack need $(l)60 seconds' rest$().
$(bpurple)Special : $()to avoid low fps, the number of strange cat in range is limited in $(bred)config file$().$(br)$(bgreen)Plant Food : $()It will instantly attack several enemies.
